param.name: brush
param.para: Describes how the area is painted.

summary.para: Returns the requested stroke parameters. Any parameters that are non-null will receive the value of the requested parameter.

param.name: brush
param.para: Describes how the stroke is painted.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: The the number of dashes in the dash array.

summary.para: Returns the number of dashes in the dash array.

returns.para: Returns the number of dashes in the dash array.

summary.para: Provides values to an SVG glyph for fill.

param.name: brush
param.para: Describes how the area is painted. A null brush will cause the context-fill value to come from the . If the defaultFillBrush is also null, the context-fill value will be 'none'. To set the ‘context-fill’ value, this method uses the provided brush with its opacity set to 1. To set the ‘context-fill-opacity’ value, this method uses the opacity of the provided brush.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Provides values to an SVG glyph for stroke properties. The brush with opacity set to 1 is used as the 'context-stroke'. The opacity of the brush is used as the 'context-stroke-opacity' value.

param.name: brush
param.para: Describes how the stroke is painted. A null brush will cause the context-stroke value to be none.

param.name: dashes
param.para: Specifies the 'context-value' for the 'stroke-dasharray' property. A null value will cause the stroke-dasharray to be set to 'none'.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: The the number of dashes in the dash array.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: This object supplies the values for context-fill, context-stroke, and context-value that are used when rendering SVG glyphs.
